duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and optimize all production process variables to ensure peak reliability and efficiency of production equipment.
Support health, environment, and safety processes and regulations, and maintain a safe working environment.
Monitor, troubleshoot, repair, and maintain oil and gas production equipment.
Acquire fluid level information, recordkeeping, and data input.
Operate and monitor SCADA, testing safety devices, and acquiring fluid level data.
Partner with others and create work orders for inventory and work planning utilizing computerized maintenance management systems.
Adhere to operational excellence standards and regulatory requirements, and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED or equivalent (Associates preferred)
